faqs.question: Which Burgundy producers do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy from top producers including DRC, Leroy, Rousseau, Roumier, Jayer, and other recognized grand cru and premier cru domaines.

faqs.question: Do you buy DRC?
faqs.answer: Yes. We buy all Domaine de la Romanee-Conti wines including Romanee-Conti, La Tache, Richebourg, and the full range. These are highly sought after.

faqs.question: How important is storage history for Burgundy?
faqs.answer: Very important. Burgundy is sensitive to storage conditions. Documentation of proper cellar storage significantly strengthens value.

faqs.question: What fill levels are acceptable?
faqs.answer: Acceptable fill depends on the wine's age. Recent vintages should show into neck. Older wines may show some natural ullage.

faqs.question: Do you buy white Burgundy?
faqs.answer: Yes. We buy collectible white Burgundy from grand cru vineyards like Montrachet and Corton-Charlemagne from recognized producers.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day for Burgundy submissions.

faqs.question: What makes Burgundy so collectible?
faqs.answer: Limited production from small vineyards, combined with exceptional quality and global demand, makes top Burgundy highly collectible.

faqs.question: Do you verify Burgundy authenticity?
faqs.answer: Yes. We review photos for authenticity indicators and conduct full verification during physical inspection.
